channel.title: 667/728 Item's only sell for 1 gp to shops
channel.description:
I've worked with 317's before, but things in this 667/728 are really different. Everything has the buy prices I want, but when I go to sell something to a store to make money I get the message "shop will buy for: 0 coins. Right-click to sell". And then when I go to sell, I actually get 1 coin back. I need to fix it, but I can't figure out how, And I really have given it a hard try before coming here to ask.
*p.s. Everything is packed in .s and .e files and so on, so there is no .cfg for me to mess with... Well there is a prices.cfg, but it only affects the G.E. prices (don't currently have selling in my ge...)
EDIT: Here is the code from shop.java that I believe has to do with the problem..
int price = getSellPrice(item, dq); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( item.getDefinitions().getName() + ": shop will buy for: " + price + " " + ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(money).getName() .toLowerCase() + ". Right-click the item to sell.");

item.title: 667/728 Item's only sell for 1 gp to shops
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

I sent you a message in your inbox cause im not quite sure which file would be the item.cfg, and I dont think I would know what to do from there. I’m so brain dead from getting all the bugs from this server that I can’t even think.

EDIT: Think I found the item.cfg, its a packed file called bonuses.ib and there is also one called bonuses.ib~. Those are the only ones…are the prices all in there with the stats?

Read full topic
item.source: 667/728 Item's only sell for 1 gp to shops

If you don’t know what to do from there let me know

item.title: 667/728 Item's only sell for 1 gp to shops
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

I’ve worked with 317’s before, but things in this 667/728 are really different. Everything has the buy prices I want, but when I go to sell something to a store to make money I get the message “shop will buy for: 0 coins. Right-click to sell”. And then when I go to sell, I actually get 1 coin back. I need to fix it, but I can’t figure out how, And I really have given it a hard try before coming here to ask.

*p.s. Everything is packed in .s and .e files and so on, so there is no .cfg for me to mess with…
Well there is a prices.cfg, but it only affects the G.E. prices (don’t currently have selling in my ge…)

EDIT:
Here is the code from shop.java that I believe has to do with the problem…

int price = getSellPrice(item, dq);
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
item.getDefinitions().getName()
+ ": shop will buy for: "
+ price
+ " "
+ ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(money).getName()
.toLowerCase()
+ “. Right-click the item to sell.”);

Read full topic
